summary: This is an email from December 2, 2020, with the subject 'transition.prep.memo.for.audrey.docx' and an attached document of the same name. The sender provides comments on the attached memo, thanks the recipient for their work, and indicates they look forward to discussing it the next day.

persons.name: Audrey
persons.context: The email subject and attachment reference a transition preparation memo intended for Audrey, indicating she is likely involved in some transition planning effort.

events.title: Email exchange regarding transition memo
events.description: An email is sent with comments on a transition preparation memo intended for Audrey, with a discussion planned for the following day.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 2, 2020, concerning a transition preparation memo.
The memo is specifically intended for an individual named Audrey.
The sender provides comments on the memo, started without redlining but then began to redline after the first paragraph.
The sender thanks the recipient for their work and looks forward to a discussion the next day.
